about_the_game:
BARA Labs is a short collection of experimental prototype games made by our team.

We will decide whether or not to make a full-length game out of the shorts based on how the prototypes are received by the players.

Prototypr - Spoiled Red Riding Hood

Little Red was a boy who had a loving family, living with his father, mother, and grandmother. However, for some reason, his grandfather lived separately in the depths of the forest.

Little Red Riding Hood had a strong bond with his grandfather, and he always wore the red hooded cape that his grandfather had given him.

He often ventured alone to visit his grandfather, and he would often encounter a kind hunter. The hunter seemed to take care of his grandfather, and their relationship appeared to be quite good. Little Red Riding Hood also had a secret crush on the hunter. However, for some reason, his grandmother despised the hunter.

On the day after Little Red Riding Hood turned 18, he and his family had spent a joyful birthday celebration at home.

Wanting to share his happiness with his grandfather and hoping to see the hunter he secretly admired, Little Red Riding Hood carefully packed his birthday cake and embarked on his journey to visit his grandfather...

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains a significant amount of satire, coarse language, and dark humour, with mild horror elements. It is not suitable for all age groups.

name: BARA Labs

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 / 11 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 / 11 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1070
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

dejus.descriptors:

Conteúdo sexual
Violência fantasiosa
